name: Zao
description:
Our first game which is a short horror.

The game is a story of a little boy in a village in an island in south of Iran.

Everything is going wrong in the Island and you must try to leave.

Controls:

Movement : WASD

Interact: Mouse Left Click

Zoom: Mouse Right Click

Light Candle (if you have one) : E

Hint: Avoid the darkness.

We apologize for copyright infrigments, we are poor.
